text: (inspiring music)
- My name is Donta Moore.
I'm a senior technical sourcer with AWS.

And I currently support
the AWS Sales, Marketing,
and Support Team.

My day-to-day role at AWS
is addressing the challenges

that my customers are having
with growing their teams.
(inspiring music)
The majority of the roles

that I recruit for are
solution architects,
specifically for different industries.

So oil and gas, energy,
healthcare, travel and hospitality,
agriculture, mining and minerals.

It always changes and so one
of the things that I like

is I always have to I'm
constantly learning.
I'm constantly learning new industries.

You know, how do I find
the people I'm looking for
for Amazon in healthcare?

I tend to look for the
industry experience first.

So a lot of the people
that I support are helping
to lead industries into what solutions
will look like in the future.

And the only way that
they can earn the trust
of our partners is by really being deep
within that industry.
Typically, cloud technology is something
I'm not looking for.

We've had a lot of
success at hiring people
from different industries and then,

through our AWS certifications,
helping them to get

the knowledge that they need
to support the customers
that we're gonna have them support.
(inspiring music)
So diversity is really important with us.
And I was able to write a document.

And first of all, writing
wasn't one of my strong suits.
So working with my leader, you know,
I've become a better writer.

I was able to present a
paper to one of the leaders

of the business that I
support in which every member

of the team has the opportunity
to help me once a week

in identifying diverse
candidates for roles
that we currently have open.

So taking the whole business
along that journey with me

has probably been a highlight
'cause I've been in recruiting

for close to 20 years
and in no other company

have I seen the opportunity
to really have the business

get that involved with
helping to diversify
the community that we have.

AWS will give you the
opportunity to work at a scale
that not many other companies operate at.

The things that we're doing,
we can't copy anyone else

'cause no one else has done
what we're doing at this scale.
